narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Kentuckiana Detox and Rehab Center is a Clinic/Center, Rehabilitation, Substance Use Disorder provider based in Clarksville, IN. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $22.1M in Medicaid payments across 49K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $22.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
